body_html:
https://www.tensorflow.org/get_started/os_setup should be updated to tell people that bazel must not be run with --batch (and the bazel server not be killed or restarted in any other way) between configure and build. Also, this means that one must not switch to another build machine between these 2 steps.

Related: issues #4105 and #4841

Related: issues #4105 and #4841
body:
https://www.tensorflow.org/get_started/os_setup should be updated to tell people that bazel must not be run with --batch (and the bazel server not be killed or restarted in any other way) between configure and build. Also, this means that one must not switch to another build machine between these 2 steps.

Related: issues #4105 and #4841
